website_summaries.verdict: This versatile, C-shaped pillow offers unparalleled support and even works well as a nursing pillow postpartum.
pros: Body contour support system relieves achy joints & other pregnancy pains and helps expectant mothers get a good night's sleep
cons: Some people may find the head part too high if they're used to a flatter pillow

customer_reviews.title: So glad i bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I am glad I decide to go for it. I was hesitant because it isn't cheap and people said it is huge, but I am very happy. I am not small and we have a full bed and this has been fine. It has really helped me sleep! I am 23 weeks pregnant and the past couple weeks have been more difficult for sleeping. This pillow has helped me to sleep comfortably on my left side and stay tilted when I'm on my back with my legs up. I love it! Only complaint would be that it is warm, but nothing other than that. It is soft and comfy, not too firm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jadey Jade

customer_reviews.title: So Cozy that my CAT steals MY pillow but I am the one who is PREGNANT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is life changing. It straightens your spine and provides comfort to your tummy. I absolutely love it and constantly have to claim my pillow before my cat does. I end up sharing 90% of the time. She freakn loves it. I love it. Win win chicken dinner. WARNING: You might need to buy 2 pregnancy pillows. 1 for you (the pregnant one) and 1 for your cat (who is not pregnant)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE PACKAGE SAYS IT CONTAINS CHEMICALS THAT CAUSE BIRTH DEFECTS
customer_reviews.text: Simple.... I just bought my pregnant wife a pillow with chemicals that cause birth defects.
customer_reviews.author: J. Klingenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: It honestly took me a while to adjust to this pillow, but I am finally there and I love it. I prefer to have the long side in front of me instead of behind, but that's just preference. I am not 33 weeks pregnant, and this is the only pillow I use every night. I would highly recommend this over the others that are much more expensive. Plus, it has a zippered outside cover that is comfortable enough to sleep on, but makes washing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kwilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same pillow back in 2016 during my last pregnancy when it only came in one color (white) and loved it so I figured I would repurchase for my current pregnancy. The quality has significantly changed the pillow doesn’t provide any support or comfort and feels very cheap. I am very disappointed as I was expecting it to be the same as it was before. Now I have to find something else because this is not going to help me at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: I hate resting my face on it
customer_reviews.text: More stars for the pillow than for the pillowcase. The pillow is the right firmness and thickness for me, and the pressure from the cushion behind me helps my back pain. The pillowcase, however, barely fits properly and is scratchy as hell. I hate resting my face on it, as pictured, and that's really what you have to do to sleep in this pillow. I've ended up pulling a nice soft blanket under my face, the same one I was balling up to use as an extra pillow before this arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this pillow because I'm pregnant and having a lot of trouble sleeping. When I got it I was a little confused how it was supposed to give any support given that it came squished in a tiny box and was super flat. I read the paper that came with it and saw that it said to give the pillow 48 hours to fluff up, so I did, but unfortunately mine stayed pretty flat. I tried it anyways, but as I expected it didn't give me any support because of how flat it was. Hopefully other people have more luck fluffing their pillows than me, but I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Maternity item has label warning that it causes birth defects, cancer or other reproductive harm!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for a pregnant relative. When proceeding to wrap it the first thing I saw was a label stating " California PROP 65 Warning. This product contains a chemical known to the state of California to cause birth defects, cancer, or other reproductive harm." Why would Pharmedco produce a product for a young mother that could harm the fetus she carries? This product is not suitable for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep I’ve had in years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to ease joint pain caused by joint hypermobility. It is so comfortable. It allows you to sleep in several different positions. I bought the “C” shaped. It’s huge! As you can tell, it takes up more than half of my queen sized bed. It’s not too soft and not too firm. It’s just right! It comes zipped in a pillow cover, which I have not had to wash just yet. Would definitely recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my new pillow!!! It is incredibly comfortable! I'm not even pregnant and I bought it because I needed the support of pillows all around me. I used to sleep with one pillow between my knees, one behind my back, one under my head, and another in front of me to support my arm and this amazing wrap-around pillow as replaced them all! I highly recommend this for anyone who needs pillow support around them while they sleep...of course it would be fabulous for use while you're pregnant, but also great for anyone with back problems, hip alignment problems, or anyone who just wants a more comfortable night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: GIAVANNA

customer_reviews.title: It has helped SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought pregnancy pillows were a scam. They're so expensive and I could get along for a couple months with the pillows we already owned. Well around 26 weeks I was getting really uncomfortable. Not sleeping good at all, my belly felt heavy and my back was achy all day and night. I ordered this and it's helped tremendously. It's heavy weight so it doesn't move around, it's so comfortable to lay in and it works for my short and petite 5' tall frame. My husband is a little upset that it's taken his place but he also love snuggling in it because it's so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Payden Varwig

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't offer needed pregnancy support.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be perfect because of all the high reviews. But it only works if you're okay staying the the same position all night long without moving. And being pregnant that is clearly not an option. It doesn't offer very good support, either you get it support on the back or the front but not both. Honestly 4/5 pillows work better than this. Because you're able to tuck it them under your stomach, back, and legs to the degree of support you want where this pillow does not. Positive, it is firm but it also hinders good contouring to your body... Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenalyn Lyman

customer_reviews.title: May cause Birth Defects!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although originally I gave this product 5 stars, I I had to revise it to 1 star because the box which I just read has a disclaimer that states that this product may cause birth defects. How can a pregnancy pillow have a disclaimer that states may cause birth defects. Ugh... Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: KCharmz

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I am not pregnant, I bought this pillow because I was having trouble sleeping at night. I was not able to get comfortable with regular pillows. I usually sleep with a pillow under my knees when I'm on my back, or in between my legs when I'm on my side but they would move around and go flat leaving me to toss and turn. With this pillow I can sleep on my side or my back comfortably and not wake up in the middle of the night with sore shoulders or an achy back. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: So cozy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this pillow because it seemed sort of... unnecessary? I wasn't sleeping well and was always uncomfortable so I caved and ordered it and I'm so glad I did. This thing is SO comfortable. I told my sister I'm going to keep using it even after I have the baby because I sleep so well with it. The downsides are that of course it's huge, so it takes up a lot of room on the bed. It's also not super easy to get into/out of, which is kind of a hassle when you pee every 10 minutes, like pregnant people tend to do. All things considered, I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a flat hard pillow that tears open very easily. Ordered two extra "C" shape pregnancy covers (from ...
customer_reviews.text: Flat, Torn, & Hard. I don't know what they were measuring in the description because there is not a measurement of 2.7" since that is its height. This is a flat hard pillow that tears open very easily. Ordered two extra "C" shape pregnancy covers (from another vendor) and was sent "J" shape instead...after 25 minutes on the phone with PharMeDoc, I was told to open the package because even though it is labeled "J cover", it is actually a "C cover". Sure enough it was a "C cover"!!! Incorrectly labeled and sent out anyway--who does that? Stay away from these guys and their products. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for the legs, but too high/firm for me to lay my head on. Also doesn't support my back like I need it to, it slides around too much. The cover ripped after a few days. *update* after months of use, I've determined this pillow isn't worth it. I can't find a replacement cover and it just gets in the way. I could have just used a normal pillow for my legs since it's the only thing it's good for.
customer_reviews.author: Rowbee

customer_reviews.title: Great for short period of time, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for over two months now and it has now flattened in some areas. I want to love this pillow and after doing so much research, I purchased this one. At first I loved this pillow but it has no flattened on both hooked parts of the pillow as well as the back support which makes this pillow useless. I have to add other pillows in certain areas to provide more support. I would recommend buying the U shaped pillows especially since this is not easy to get out of if the back support runs along the side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, not worth it, you will end up having to buy a new one
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Pillow. I had the pillow less than 5 months and its ripped open and the cotton is already falling out. It's super flat too and does not hold its shape. I now have to buy another one because I still have 11 more weeks until I give birth. Dont waste your money. Buy one that's going to last you more than 5 short months.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Umm it doesn't work as much as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is too skinny to help prevent my daughter in law from turning on her back. We have long pillows that bought from Walmart for $10 a while back, and they work better in terms of providing cushion and preventing her from sleeping on her back than this pregnant pillow. She has been using the 2 long pillows, 1 in front and 1 in back, before this pregnant pillow. With all the raving reviews, we thought this pregnant pillow will do better, but it doesn't and it costs about $46! The 2 long pillows from Walmart total is only about $20. I will be returning this pregnant pillow.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this pillow. I purchased this pillow because I have serious back problems and arthritis in my knees. Ever since I started using it I have been able to sleep so much better at night and my knees don't have to touch. If you have knee problems you know exactly what I mean. I only wish I thought to purchase this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Torib

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price compared to other like items. It's easy to wash the case and get the case back on--I was worried about this after reading the other reviews. I still struggle with finding the best position in this thing, and it really is huge (which isn't an issue for my King bed, but could see it being really tough to use it in anything smaller). I've had it about 2 months and it's already pretty lumpy. This will hopefully get me through this pregnancy, but I don't see this being a mainstay or having much life left in it after the baby is born.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this pillow! It’s comfortable & it supports both my baby belly & my back. It’s ideal for side sleeping, but I have also used it as a kind of cocoon for back sleeping. One of my kiddos spilled their chocolate milk on it, & the cover came off for easy cleaning, & went back on easily as well. In my first pregnancy, I had the leachco pillow, which I really liked. This pillow is about half the cost, & equal quality. Plus, it came with a removable cover that the leachco did not come with! I highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: mrsm18

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly pink pregnancy pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently 23 weeks pregnant. I’ve been debating about purchasing a pregnancy pillow, but I’ve had lots of recommendations so I did a little research and purchased this because of the 9,000+ reviews. Pro: -it wraps around me perfectly -love the baby pink color -packaging was perfect (box & plastic wrap) -no damage to pillow upon arrival -enjoying the curves because one part lies against & under my back Con: -pillow gets hot to sleep with -flatter than I thought, so I have to double up for certain positions: under my legs, behind my back, sometimes under my belly Would I buy this again? Possibly. I look forward to using this pillow for several pregnancies. Hopefully it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sok

customer_reviews.title: So not flat!!!
customer_reviews.text: So to all those people out there saying this is a flat pillow your crazy. This pillow was perfect helped me sleep and everything the only complaint I had was that theew was too much stuffing in it. I had move stuffing down away from the head area because it made my neck really stiff I had to go home from work early and called out the next day because of how painful my neck was. I'm hoping that since I moved the stuffing my neck will get better. I will just have to use my regular pillow for my head. Over all I would suggest this pillow to any and everyone. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Burns

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pillow for a little over 3 weeks. Already some of the stuffing has disintegrated so that I either have no support for my head or no support between my legs. I'm super disappointed in that and being that I'm 32 weeks pregnant I need all the support I can get. It currently resides in the corner of our room and my son will sit on it to read a book.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall people
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11", long torso and legs, this digs into my shoulder and crotch. It was so uncomfortable and the only reason I kept it because it was such a pain to try and pack back up. It does come in handy when you need a wall to place around your infant who hasn't figured out how to crawl or climb short walls. Only good when you need to make a quick pee or refill water cup. This way you can slow them down.
customer_reviews.author: Keta

customer_reviews.title: Your life will improve with this pillow, seriously.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this pillow. I thought it would just provide some relief for the discomfort that comes with being pregnant but it is also incredibly comfortable. I prefer it to all other pillows and use it exclusively now. I may even have to buy my husband is own because he loves using it too! It also provides a helpful barrier to protect the baby while I’m sleeping with my husband who has a tendency to flail around in his sleep. He was thinking he might have to sleep elsewhere but not since buying this pillow! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Anderson Harris

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so comforting! It’s like a giant hug all the way around your body. I love it! I bought it to keep from rolling onto my back while pregnant. It did help, but didn’t prevent it. It’s more of a deterrent, but if you’re hardcore sleeping and try to roll, you still can. I slept really well with it. I’d say the only downside is trying to get in and out of it. It’s big, so it takes some resituating to get back into bed after getting up to go to the bathroom. Overall, it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Patron

customer_reviews.title: Comfy at first but not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pillow the first couple of weeks that I used it. But it’s not firm enough for me as I get farther along in my pregnancy. When it’s between my legs, the pillow gets flattened by the morning and also when I lay my head on it, by morning my head has sunk so far into the pillow that it’s uncomfortable. The jersey cover has a ton of piling on it after only using it for a couple of weeks & washing didn’t help take those out. I purchased a different body pillow that’s more firm and has a nicer cover and I like it a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Devann

customer_reviews.title: Too hard.
customer_reviews.text: its too firm for me and I find it uncomfortable. I had a U shaped one for my last pregnancy and it was amazing. I decided to try this one because everyone was talking about the snoogle and this is similar. I say just go for the snoogle. This is rock hard and not that comfy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: APoston2506

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable + easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfortable pillow to sleep with! I did not believe the hype about body pillows until I gave this a try, thinking that Amazon has a friendly return policy if I find that it is not for me. I typically do not nap in the middle of the day. But the first day I received this body pillow, I found that I fell asleep for four hours when I thought that I was just testing it out for a few minutes. The pillow case comes on and off easily and washes well. The fabric did not show any signs of pilling after it went through the cold cycle in my washer and the low temp dryer cycle.
customer_reviews.author: prashant kumar

customer_reviews.title: As most people have said not much fluff in this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow doesn't have much fluff in it, so every time I use it my neck kills me when I wake up. I don't like it and I wouldn't recommend buying it. As others have stated it does get really hot which sucks when I'm already sweating to death because I'm knocked up. I think if you are going to buy a body pillow just buy a cheap one from a local store. This one was almost $40 and it is the same as a $10 pillow at a local store. Just not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: CCF

customer_reviews.title: Soft & cozy
customer_reviews.text: This was my best friend (and my cat's best friend) during pregnancy. I got it early second trimester because I had hip pain when I slept. It relieved that immediately. Then it became useful for support all over. It was a little awkward to get out of for those mid-night pees, especially as I got bigger, but I eventually developed a sort of roll to get out of it. I didn't keep it post-partum so we had more space on the bed, but I remember this pillow fondly and recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Second one since the first was taken by my husband
customer_reviews.text: Due to back pain and prepping for a family I had bought a gray one a year or two ago that my husband took over when my back pain became less. Sleeping with it is more comfortable for him due to knee pain, and for me in part because I move in my sleep and this helps keep me in place more easily (and less likely to hit in my sleep due to a bit of buffer.) I wanted one again for myself without taking "his" so now have the light blue as well. The gray one does a better job at hiding fuzzies, but both are comfy! Picture included to show how two fit on a queen sized bed.
customer_reviews.author: LovesSleep

customer_reviews.title: Baby Blue color is beautiful inside and out
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so excited when she received her gift from me. She said it is perfect, the blue color is beautiful and she is sleeping so much better now. It's the perfect gift for sleeping during pregnancy and will come in handy once the baby is born. The product is well made. I bought one for my daughter and my grandson is 3 months old and while she doesn't sleep with it any longer, she still uses it daily for breasting feeding, assistance in holding some or all of the weight of the baby, and other uses. This product is for more than just a good nights rest.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am 7 months pregnant and this pillow gives you the support you need. I also use it when I am watching tv or reading.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Throughly unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently 5 months pregnant and have been using 3 pillows to get comfortable at night. I bought this pillow based on all the great reviews and feel like I just threw money out the window. It’s long and flat! Even if it magically plumps up, there isn’t enough stuffing in it to be supportive. At 5’2”, the pillow basically encases my entire body in the most awkward way possible. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this pillow recommend to anyone pregnant trying to get comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a second one I've bought my other one I destroyed after 2 years of using it everyday all day whenever I needed it while pregnant used it after my pregnancy bought my new one and I am not pregnant but I love that and I will probably continue to buy these every couple years as I need them I love this pillow can't express that enough and I would recommend to anyone that is pregnant and having difficulties getting comfortable while sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Husband now jealous of pillow...
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! I’ve had horrible sciatica and round ligament pains during this pregnancy with my son. I wish I was one of those people that can say “I love pregnancy!” Nope... this has allowed me to actually SLEEP. My husband is actually kind of jealous of the pillow and now calls it “Chad”. I can’t help that Chad meets my current needs. I love Chad. I’d kick my husband out of bed before Chad. I still have to occasionally wake up and switch hips just because that’s where most of my pain is but I wouldn’t trade this pillow for anything.
customer_reviews.author: MelB23

customer_reviews.title: Not a good pillow for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this product low because it just didn’t work for me. It lacked support for my belly, there was always this uncomfortable gap and agitated my already pain and discomfort. Hard to sleep in especially if you can’t stay in one position like myself, it was very difficult to change positions and always woke up my partner. On a good note, folding it in half and using it against the wall helped with my nighttime heartburn
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Michelle Lee

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is incredibly comfortable and helped me a lot with my snoring
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is incredibly comfortable and helped me a lot with my snoring. Having my head propped up and curing into it helps me not snore at all or at least not as often. Down side of this pillow is that i have had it for a short period of time less than a month and i have already torn both curved corners of it. I wish it was more durable, but even though i torn it I would still say this is a great buy. Just advise to be careful stretching out in the pillow and being a lil to rough with it. I will be patching mine up and keeping it thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyC

customer_reviews.title: Why is it PINK?!?
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be of okeyish quality though the zipper was stuck at first and I was worried the cover is thin enough it might tear from trying to get it unstuck. But it worked, so for now I'm ok. What I am most upset about is that the cover is hot pink. It says nowhere or shows anywhere a hot pink cover and I greatly dislike this color. I'll keep it for now as the function is more important but still... So Be warned, you might not get a white one as picture indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Schnups

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is so soft and of no use. Different from pic
customer_reviews.text: It’s not at all same as shown in pic. The foam of pillow is so bad and it’s not properly distributed or what but it didn’t help me at all. I wanted to return by ended up spilling tea so can’t return. Don’t buy and save money
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Super Cozy and Versatile Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this pillow for 2 nights now, but at 25 weeks pregnant, it has been my best purchase to date! I absolutely love going to bed and having this with me. It makes sleeping so much more comfortable. Prior to this I was using a throw pillow between my knees for support - but this has been significantly better. It isn’t too firm - it’s actually quite plush (but not so much that you sink right into it). I also love the mint green cover. So far, I have no regrets! Update: I still love this pillow but putting the cover back on is a nightmare! 😫
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A pregnant womans best friend.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been an absolute lifesaver during this pregnancy. I was okay for the first few weeks and after having a complication with my hips that prevented me from getting an ounce of sleep, I caved and purchased this pillow. BEST decision ever. I can sleep on my back, sides, and tummy still and always find a way to be comfortable. Being tall and having this pillow be my height is a god send. I can put a section of the pillow under my bump and put a section between my knees which gives me so much relief. I 100% am going to still be using this pillow once my son arrives in August.
customer_reviews.author: Brantley’s Mama

customer_reviews.title: This is a pregnant lady lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently pregnant and my back was killing me, my hips were aching, and everything was sore. I was barely sleeping due to being so uncomfortable. I got this pillow thinking it would provide some relief. If was a complete GAME CHANGER. I am sleeping better, and I also use it to sit up in bed or on my couch. It gives extra support & comfort and has alleviated so much of my pregnancy discomfort! I wish it was beefier/bigger but in reality it is the right size to fit in bed and stay flexible for when I fold it to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: AppleDapple

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain and numbness while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: My wife was haven't trouble sleeping and was experience pain and numbness in areas. To help with the support she purchased this pillow and it has helped her significantly. It wraps around her on both sides and she doesn't move much at night. She said she sleeps so much better with this pillow. Would recommend this over other pillows while pregnant as we have tried others and none of them were as comfortable as this one.
customer_reviews.author: BeDaHHH

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but could be more supportive.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this pillow is so comfortable I 100% see myself continuing to sleep with it after my pregnancy. My boss encouraged me to spring for one early on in my pregnancy, so I have been using this since the first trimester. As I near the end of my second, I find that it is not providing the support that I had hoped. I am still very glad I have it, but I wish the material provided a bit more support as I still wake up every morning with backaches.
customer_reviews.author: borderrat906

customer_reviews.title: Great body pillow for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not pregnant, but I bought this hoping it'd help me keep a better sleeping position for my spine and stuff. In the end I probably have to do more than just buy a body pillow for my level of back pain, but I do sleep much more comfortably at least when I use this! I feel like it's great quality for what I paid. I've had it for about a couple months now; there's no sign of wear and tear and it hasn't lost its fluffiness yet either. Honestly the biggest downside is my dogs love it too so I've got to share lol. If you're looking for this type of pillow I really recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so soft yet firm enough to maintain its shape and not get flattened. It's really long and supports my back while wrapping around my entire body on both sides and can go between my legs for more support. My daughter hijacked my pillow and now she sleeps with it! I ordered another one for me and can't wait for it to be delivered! She said it's so comfy it makes her feel paralyzed cause she doesn't want to move :D This pillow feels like a hug and it doesn't make you feel hot. I also love the calming seafoam green color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied but quality is reflected in low proce
customer_reviews.text: I overall really like this pillow and sleep with it every night. It helps a lot with side sleeping during pregnancy and lower back pain. The quality is fine especially for the price—I wasn’t sure if I’d like this type of pillow and didn’t want to invest more into something I might not use. I like that the pillow case is washable (though very thin). I’ve been using it for about three months now and it is noticeably flatter. I don’t mind this but some might if they prefer a very fluffy, plushy pillow. If that’s what you’d prefer, I’d go for a pricier version.
customer_reviews.author: cke

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant buyer beware- Prop 65
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned this product- which is ironically advertised as “designed in California”- carries a California Prop 65 warning that states it contains a chemical that is known to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm. Returning immediately. I went back and looked and did not see that disclosed anywhere on the product description. Buyer beware! I wish had read more reviews before purchasing but I literally ordered it at 3:00 in the morning when I couldn’t sleep because of severe hip pain secondary to pregnancy. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your pregnant do your self a favor...... Grab it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pregnancy and let me tell you this pillow is God sent! I've had extreme morning sickness to the point where im losing weight instead of gaining, cant sleep and have terrible aches and pain all over. Since receiving the pillow i can sleep a good 5 hrs which is better then 1! When im extremely nauseous i place it in a circle like the pic above it helps with the aches and pains plus relieves the nausea
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: If you're serious enough about buying this to even be reading this review, you need it. If you're pregnant, GIRL YOU NEED IT. It takes a couple nights to break it in so it didn't hurt my neck to use all night but once it did, omg. SO much better than wedging pillows everywhere that fall out of the bed 100 times a night. I love doubling it and using it to sit up and read in bed too. If you have a full size bed like we do it might push your husband out of the bed, but it's okay. You need this more than you need to sleep next to a lumberjack.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep again!
customer_reviews.text: I have had money over 2 weeks now. I had really bad back pain due to a previous accident before getting pregnant so I have issues with my disc in my neck and back. The winter doesn't help with that either. I bought the pillow and felt reliefthe first night! I docked 1 star because the pillow seems worn out already and I have a small hole on it. It's not completely flat but it's not as firm as it once was. o read previous reviews with the same issue so I decided to rotate mine often but it did not save the pillow. I may just buy another if I need too.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My Best Friend Through Pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver! I am currently 20 weeks pregnant and have had this pillow since I was about 12weeks as I was suffering from back pain. It offers firm support but not too firm. It is super comfortable and makes you feel like you are being hugged. I really like the “C” shape of this pillow. I have seen others that are “U” shaped and they don’t seem as versatile as this pillow. Case is removable which is nice for washing (kind of tricky to put back on but not too bad). So thankful for this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant Wife LOVES this thing
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this at about 20 weeks once it started becoming difficult to sleep and she absolutely LOVES this thing. She basically described it like this: when you're pregnant you can't lay on your back OR your belly but, as we all know, laying on your side every night can be uncomfortable and, for many of us, difficult to do. This pillow allows you to FEEL like you're laying on your back or belly because you're able to position the pillow accordingly and take weight off of your shoulders. I hope that explanation from her makes sense. All I know is that while I haven't used it personally, for my (now 23 week pregnant) wife it's been a game changer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for pregnancy sleeping woes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow during my second trimester of pregnancy when I started to notice how often I was waking up due to hip pain. This pillow has been excellent for relieving hip pain and I've been using it for about two months with uninterrupted sleep, which is a miracle now in my third trimester. My only criticism is that my pillow case arrived with a quarter sized hole in it and it hasn't held up well with weekly washing. The once soft pillow case is now starting to become rough and pilled. I was disappointed, but put one of our own pillow cases over the head section.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is really very comfortable when you are pregnant, it helps relieve some the pressure or extra weight from between your sore legs and that precious little bump that you have. If it's hard for you to get comfortable at night during those last few months of pregnancy I would definitely recommend giving this pillow a try. It was recommended to me by several people, so I'm passing it along! Also, this price on Amazon is one of the better prices I found, I did search around and found some prices that were about the same, otherwise its more expensive other places!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Paine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple of months now and I love it. I see no need to go for other brands that are double the price. It’s super soft, easy to wash and provides me a lot of support when sleeping. It took a little getting used to at first but I was waking up with back pain if I tried using my normal pillow that I had before pregnancy. This provides great support no matter the position I am in. The only negative is I can’t cuddle with my husband anymore but I guess that’s part of the pregnancy journey.
customer_reviews.author: coco12

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 25 weeks pregnant and have had lower back pain even before pregnancy. Lots of support with this pillow and a great size to wrap around and under all your nooks and crannies. I'm a constant shifter from side to side through the night and a frequent bathroom user which is the only downside to the massive size is finding it hard to get in and out of bed with it. Otherwise it's a great investment that you can certainly use well after the baby is born with feeding or just couch lounging, or a snake toy (my 4 year old loves playing with it).
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Personally it was a big waste of my money. It made my neck and back hurt. But you might love it! Just know you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Cotton in the pillow was not a good quality, you can really feel the cotton was not connected. The colors also looks different from the picture. Overall, not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pillow saved my sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this pillow is so great, but I was not sleeping well at 19 weeks pregnant. This pillow arrived, and now I don't have back pain or random waking up in the night (except to pee, because, pregnancy.) I never want to get out of bed wrapped around this thing. I did wash the cover once and it pilled some, which isn't great, but I can't complain too much because I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie e

customer_reviews.title: I am not pregnant but I love it
customer_reviews.text: I tried out this pillow when my sister was pregnant. I had such a wonderful sleep. Months later I bought my own pillow. I’m not pregnant, but sometimes I wake up a little sore so that’s why I bought it. My sleep quality improved and I’m much more comfortable! Soft, but also firm (its great support for my bones). am 5 foot two inches and this fits me perfectly. Get this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed it to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as supportive as I would have hoped for. If you are pregnant reading this then you can understand how much pressure is placed all over your body during pregnancy. I was hoping this item would be more of a memory foam material for a more firm support system. I honestly dont use it much. I just prop pillows behind my back and under my belly. Seems to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Too Big and bulky for me
customer_reviews.text: First time after 2 babies, that I bought this. I thought it was going to work with me bc I usually do sleep with multiple pillows at night. However it didnt. I feel like it was too big and bulky. Which I get it, its supposed to be a body pillow. But I ended up buying a smaller one that I could just place underneath my bump while I sleep on my side. This pillow was too big and bulky for me. I also didnt like how much space it took on my bed. Lol I ended up giving it away to my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t expecting to love it this much
customer_reviews.text: Really wasn’t expecting this to change my life. It did. Im cheep so was nervous about purchasing. I am so much more comfortable during the night. My belly is supported and my hips are not in terrible pain when I wake. Also helpful when just sitting in bed if you twist it different ways. Have fun with it. Love the color too. Really nice quality all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: For a $40 pillow I expected it to be a lot more plush and comfortable. It looks so much more full in the photos. I’m not impressed with the quality. Also-I had two day shipping and it arrived after 6 days. Only after adding a couple of my own pillows does it become what I was seeking support wise. I’m debating on sending it back- if I can even manage to get it into the box as it came in a vacuum seal bag. Anyway- Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Myers

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years!  Helped with my sciatica and during pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow ever! So great that I’m actually on my second one. I bought my first one a few years ago because I had bad sciatica- I was told to sleep on my side instead of my stomach, which I tried to do but would always wake up on my stomach! I bought this pillow to help to keep me on my side and it worked great. I ended up using it throughout my whole pregnancy last year. It started to get a little lumpy (after over 2 years of use), so now I’m on my second one. It’s so much cheaper than competitors but just as good, if not better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rose

customer_reviews.title: Helped with hip pain!
customer_reviews.text: I was in between a U shaped pillow and the C shaped one, ultimately deciding on this one. I’m currently 20 weeks pregnant and have been having some hip/back pain since 12 weeks. I purchased this pillow in hopes it would help my pain and keep me from laying on my back and so far so good! I like that I can move it into different shapes, eventually using it for late night breast feeding sessions. Both myself and my dog enjoy snuggling in it and can’t sleep with it! Also the jersey cover is super soft and I love the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay I guess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for a month now. Currently 22weeks pregnant. This is an OKAY pillow. It’s moderately fluffy, not nearly as big as the pictures look. The pillow case is already pilled and bumpy. A huge annoyance of mine is along the inside there is a sewn seam that will dig in if I try to tuck the pillow in snug somewhere. It feels like a skinny rope being pressed into me. Unfortunately I’m not as comfortable with this pillow as I had hoped to be and I still have to use other pillows WITH this one to get the support I need. Still have hips that hurt and still end up on my back most nights.
customer_reviews.author: Morrick

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: So I am not pregnant nor do I have any back issues or physical difficulties. I am someone who simply likes comfort and this body pillow is absolutely amazing. I can wrap it around me as I sit up in bed and it supports me, I can face it in any direction and find a comfortable position. I can also wrap it up by itself and use it as a prop for my back, knees, feet. I've also placed my laptop, planner, or notebook on it and gotten some work done. This was a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: NeKa

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleeping Partner
customer_reviews.text: I not pregnant so this isn't why I bought this pillow. My purpose was because I have a very bad lower back and have a lot of pain from sleeping. Since I started sleeping with this pillow as a support against my back I've slept so much better. I love that it cradles around you to receive support from all sides. It is super long that my 5'6" frame can stretch out next to it and it still has some additional length. Overall love this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!!! Say hello to better sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is AMAZING!!! I suffer from chronic back pain due to multiple car accidents and I needed something that gave me comprehensive support from the head down. I never considered a pregnancy pillow before but after trying this I am a believer! The covering is soft and the pillow has the perfect amount of firmness and flexibility. This is the most comfortable sleep I’ve gotten and I’ve been able to sleep through the night pain free. I highly recommend this pillow to anyone looking for a better night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.author: The Dope Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy Flat Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions which was to leave the pillow out for 48 hours but it’s not as fluffy as I expected it to be. It doesn’t bounce back like memory foam would. I still have to use two extra standard pillows to actually be comfortable because I need to fold the pillow in half so both halves are behind my back. Now I just have a long flat pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have pillow, especially during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has to go down as one of our best purchases ever. Seriously, I can’t say enough positives about this pillow. I was skeptical about getting it but afterward I was so glad! It helped tremendously in the third trimester of pregnancy, and especially helped during labor and recovery at the hospital. It turned the uncomfortable hospital stay into a very comfortable hospital stay. It doubles as a great nursing pillow to replace our Boppy.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Henry

customer_reviews.title: supportive
customer_reviews.text: I used this after a surgery, and it really did make it easier to be comfortable and supported in the right places while I slept. You can arrange it in a lot of different ways, for laying down as well as sitting up. Once I recovered I didn't need it, and found it crowded the bed to much, but it is great for car camping. Good prop, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hull

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the flattest “pillow” ever. It is like a ten year old pillow that is compacted down completely. Don’t waste your money if you want any loft in you pillow or want to be comfortable. That’s a woman’s hand in the picture for reference of how flat it is. And it sat for hours unpackaged before those pictures were taken. There is no loft.
customer_reviews.author: Love Business

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I wanted to get a little wear out of it before reviewing it. I purchased for back pain,the pillow came and looked just as expected.... it was even soft. However I found it to be awkwardly uncomfortable, I just cannot figure out a comfortable way to sleep in or with it. I wake up in even more pain as well as neck pain. I can sit up in the day with it but it didn’t help with my pain or sleep,I’m very sad about that.
customer_reviews.author: Britany

customer_reviews.title: too early to tell for sure
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only did 3 stars is due to the fast that I just got the pillow. It came in earlier than expected so that was nice! The colour is what I was hoping for also. It does come vacuum sealed so it takes some "chill" time for all the stuffing to puff out. So far its thinner and not as stuffed as the pictures show. But again, I just unpacked it. The stuffing does seam to be dance and good quality. I will update once it puffs all the way out and I've had a chance to sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Real sleep again, just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was back and forth on this purchase. I already had several pillows all around me, but fighting with those various pillows offered no relief for real sleep. I finally decided to take a leap of faith and buy it. And I'm so thrilled I did! I woke up after the FIRST night and felt fully rested for the first time in 7 months. If you're on the fence, make room in your budget for this expense. You'll thank yourself and remember how important a good night of rest really is.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: BEST MONEY SPENT DURING MY PREGANCY! LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this product enough. I already told two other expecting mothers I know to purchase this and they have. For the first time in a long time, I don't toss and turn and fall to sleep much faster and sleep better! It is so cozy and wraps around and fits me perfectly! It is so versatile! I literally wake up in the same position I went to sleep! It helps to keep me from sleeping on my back too. SO COMFY!!!! I absolutely love this and wish I had bought it sooner. THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Lei M

customer_reviews.title: Over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. This was delivered to-day and right out of the bag I can tell that I will need to buy extra cotton batting and stuff it! Buht, I do like the design. It is a bit of a snake so I am going to have to name it. Slytherin?
customer_reviews.author: March Hare

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy Game charger and MUST have
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love this pillow. easy to put together. gives u the support needed. I struggled with sleep before I found out I was pregnant. once I got this pillow omg I couldnt touch the pillow with instantly falling asleep. once I got in the pillow my husband knew I wouldn't last 5 sec. Definitely a game changer and a must have. I still use the pillow and no longer can sleep without it. the pillow gives support and helps u get comfy not only that you can use it to breastfeed too. Win win win.
customer_reviews.author: Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, but really annoying
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, but really annoying. I feel like this pillow is constantly in my way of moving around. I had to take it out of my bed. I haven’t used it more than a couple times. Pro: great price. Most pregnancy pillows cost more than twice this. If you don’t move a lot, maybe it’s for you.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Roose

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I perches this pillow after tossing and turning for two months. It was literally over night that I felt the difference. My Hips knees and my neck were infantile better. After we had our son I gave the pillow to my Husband. He had a bad back and hips due to a very bad car accident. He loves it as well. I miss it so much I perched a second. This pillow is great no matter your height. He is 6'3'' and I'm 5'5''. PS. This pillow is also great if your significant other is a snorer.
customer_reviews.author: michellejones

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this body pillow. Seriously. The cover comes off to wash, the pillow itself is firm enough but not too firm, and you can sleep in a ton of different positions with it! It’s also great for lounging. I was having a lot of trouble learning to sleep on my side because I would always end up on my back (a no-no for pregnancy) and this pillow has solved my problems. Buy this NOW- you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable!-
customer_reviews.text: I am a 61 year old...active and otherwise healthy. I do suffer from herniated discs in my low back as well as my neck. I struggled to find a comfortable pillow for my neck and for my back. I gave this a try because of the great reviews. I am so glad I did. I snuggle up with the pillow and it allows me to support my back by putting the pillow between my legs and hug it as it supports my neck. I sleep better than I have in 20 years. I would definitely recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: memommy421

customer_reviews.title: Helps me get comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was hesitant on purchasing the pillow but I am so happy I did! I started getting back pains during the 4th month of pregnancy and I couldn’t sleep. After using this pillow for one night, I don’t know if I could live without it for the rest of the pregnancy. I like the c shape, the comfort ability of the pillow and how I can easily unzip the cover to wash. Most importantly, I can finally have a decent nights rest!
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Recommended pillow for people who are more accustomed to side-sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very supportive. My wife is not and has never been a side-sleeper and she found it difficult to use the pillow because of this. That said, this pillow does support her in keeping her in her side, which is what it was designed to do I have leaned against the outside of it and found it wonderful. In a Queen-sized bed, one could think that the pillow would take up the whole bed. It doesn’t not. I’d recommend the pillow, but know going into it that it won’t just make you live sleeping on your side all of the sudden.
customer_reviews.author: Voodrew10

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for any mother to be!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I bought it for my wife and shes used the crap out of it for 7 months. It cradles the necessary spots, and is super comfortable. The bad thing is that the zipper and zipper teeth are SUPER CHEAP. It took me a little bit to get the teeth to stay closed by themselves, and the zipper itself is super exposed so it pokes you whilst you sleep. All in all i still recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I originally was looking into the brand Pregnancy Pillow but their pillows are priced around $100. So I went to Amazon and found this and decided to give it a try seeing it’s great price. I’m SO happy with it. I’m only 9 weeks but I’ve been having a hard time getting comfortable at night. I’m laying with it right on my couch and I’ve never felt so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Zakiya M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loved these pillow, she swears by them! We might have a smaller family if these pillows did not exist. ;) We ordered one for each of our three pregnancies. Very versatile. From what I’m told, pregnancy can be uncomfortable, these pillows versatile and help calm a wrestles body. Great product! Not the easiest to clean because of their size and how poorly the dry. They will also tear after about three times in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: A Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just the thing for HS/Pilonidal Cyst pain both for sitting and sleeping. This is miles better than any donut or seat cushion. It's very adjustable and flexible. It is super soft and we love the color. I thought it would be huge but it arrived for snugly packed in a medium-sized box and bounced out into its full size. It is not overwhelming. It would be good for anyone who likes to sleep with support.
customer_reviews.author: MJPF

customer_reviews.title: Not Pregnant, But...
customer_reviews.text: I took my daughter's maternity pillow! My daughter loaned me her pillow for support while watching television and alleviation of acid reflux symptoms during the night. Well, after the first night, I've slept with the pillow every night for a week. When using it, my snoring is significantly reduced and I have much more sound sleep. I will have to buy her another one! I'm not sure how it works for those who need it, but I enjoy it although my pregnancy days are far behind me. It is pretty large and not something visually pretty that coordinates with home decor, but worth the investment for those who may have similar issues to what I have! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nat D.

customer_reviews.title: Superior support and firmness
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! I love this new pillow. With my previous pregnancies I owned a boppy pregnancy pillow and does not come anything close to the comfort and whole body support of the PharMeDoc. I am highly satisfied and glad I chose this one after reading great reviews and seeing is less expensive than the boppy. I truly reccomend this for a pregnant lady looking to get a good night's sleep. I love the firmness, softness, how it wraps around body and supports all around. The different colors it comes in is fun...I ordered a mint color to match my bedspread.
customer_reviews.author: Neni

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow. Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am not pregnant. I bought this to help with back issues. It's great. The only thing better than this pillow is the customer service. I recieved this pillow and after 48 hrs there was no difference in how fluffy it was. It was very flat. I contacted customer service, they asked for pictures which I sent. They apologized and quickly sent me another one. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Chick

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow
customer_reviews.text: So cute and comfortable. It's easy to move around and move around on. I've been sleeping better especially now that I'm in second trimester and can no longer sleep on my back or stomach. It also fits well on my queen with my husband without it taking up his side of the bed or getting n the way and it is great for sitting up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

product_meta.title: PharMeDoc Pregnancy Pillow with Jersey Cover, C Shaped Full Body Pillow (Light Blue)
feature_bullets: Removable and Machine Washable Jersey Knit Zipper Cover
THE ULTIMATE PREGNANCY PILLOW - C-shaped body pillow design replaces need for multiple bed pillows, helping support your back, hips, knees, neck and head.
MULTIPURPOSE MATERNITY PILLOW - Adjustable polyfill material adapts to your belly and back when you want to sleep, read, nurse, or watch TV
3rd TRIMESTER PAINS? Our full body pregnancy pillow can help ease you into a better sleep, reducing interruptions throughout the night and helping relieve back pain associated with pregnancy

MORE THAN JUST A PILLOW FOR PREGNANT WOMEN - This full body pillow is perfect for ANYONE needing more support, recovering from surgery, or tired of having to use separate pillows to support their head, neck, legs, and back
Lifetime Manufacturer Warranty Designed in California 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,060 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
